faq.title: Frequently Asked <highlight>Questions</highlight>
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about our cafe recommendations and selection process.
faq.criteria.question: How do you select the cafes?
faq.criteria.answer: We analyze verified customer reviews and ratings to identify cafes that meet our work-friendly criteria. We look for consistent mentions of reliable WiFi, adequate power outlets, comfortable seating, suitable noise levels, and a welcoming atmosphere for remote workers.
faq.update.question: How often do you update the listings?
faq.update.answer: Our directory is updated monthly with new cafes and regular checks of existing listings. We verify opening hours, amenities, and working conditions to ensure our information stays current and reliable.
faq.suggest.question: Can I recommend a cafe?
faq.suggest.answer: Absolutely! We welcome suggestions from our community. Use our submission form to recommend a cafe, and our team will review it based on our criteria before adding it to the directory.
faq.notAllCities.question: Why aren't all cities included?
faq.notAllCities.answer: We personally visit and verify each cafe before listing it. We're gradually expanding our coverage across the globe, prioritizing cities based on demand and the availability of suitable work-friendly cafes.
faq.remove.question: How can I report outdated information?
faq.remove.answer: If you notice any changes in a listed cafe or if it no longer meets work-friendly standards, please use our feedback form. We'll investigate and update our information accordingly.
